show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 117 Paul Pizzala from a London city private bank to the biggest regenerative farm in the UK
subtitle: 117 Paul Pizzala from a London city private bank to the biggest regenerative farm in the UK
summary:
How a London city private banker took a permaculture course and now applies his finance knowledge to build the biggest regenerative farm of the UK.
